channel.title: CVE Feed for Firmanet Software and Technology -- Customer Relation Manager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Firmanet Software and Technology -- Customer Relation Manager

item.title: CVE-2022-23790|2024-08-03T03:51:45.965Z -- firmanet%20software%20and%20technology -- customer%20relation%20manager
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Firmanet Software and Technology Customer Relation Manager allows Cross-Site Scripting (XSS).This issue affects Customer Relation Manager: before 2022.03.13.
